title: Bins Configuration Schema
description: Schema for binning configuration used in Riverscapes reporting. Each top-level key corresponds to a bin set for a specific column or logical group. Each bin set contains the bin edges, legend, and optional metadata.

source.description: Optional. URL or path to the source or documentation for this bin set.

edges.description: An array of numbers specifying the bin edges for pandas.cut. The length of this array should be one more than the number of bins/labels. Used with pandas.cut(..., bins=edges, include_lowest=True) to assign values to bins.

legend.description: An array of arrays, each containing two elements: a color (as a string, e.g., 'rgb(...)' or hex) and a label (string) for the bin. The number of legend entries should be one less than the number of edges.
